name: Rounded Tactics
description:
Rounded Tactics is a real time stategy (tactics!) game, solo and multiplayer.

Each player creates spheres in his territory and specialize them : artillery, jet fighters, missiles. Each sphere attacks the nearest enemy sphere. Regularly, the player who has more spheres enlarges his territory.

The goal : neutralize the enemy "king".

"This is a dynamic, abstract, simple yet deep game." (my mum)

"Better than Minecraft and the Sims together" (my four years old son)

Other spécifications

• PRICE : Pay What You Want, 0 minimum. Buy me a beer if you got anything out of it.
• PLATFORM : Windows
• SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS : a DX9 capable computer, basically something manufactured within the last few years.
• CONTROLS : Gamepad / Mouse
• AVERAGE MATCH RUNTIME : 1-4 minutes.
